actions.name: Clinging Shadow
actions.description: Effect: Connection - Phantom Force. The user gains @Affliction[transient] 1 and @Affliction[invisible] 1, and relocates itself to an open space within 2m of the target. Until the user's next Activation, they freely move with the target as the target itself moves.

system.description: Effect: Connection - Phantom Force. The user gains @Affliction[transient] 1 and @Affliction[invisible] 1, and relocates itself to an open space within 2m of the target. Until the user's next Activation, they freely move with the target as the target itself moves.
